name: Block Puzzle Classic Legend
description:
Block Puzzle Classic Legend is a simple yet challenging and addictive game.

Block Puzzle Classic Legend is Free Block Classic Game and Block Puzzle Game
- Easy to play, and pleasurable game for all ages.
- Simply Drag the blocks, and fill up all grids
- Block World Legend gets all the charm of the puzzle game simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody. It’s very helpful for improving your memory and your reflections
HOW TO PLAY
- Drag the given blocks and drop into the grid space.
- Remove the blocks by making a full line horizontally .
- Blocks can be rotated when touch to block.
FEATURES
- Easy to learn and play
- Save game
- Support leaderboard
- Funny sound effects
Block World Legend - it is a simple, fun and suitable to everybody.
Now, try it and i'm sure you will like this Block Puzzle Classic Legend game and brick puzzle game
